sentences.en: Adding defense and additional angles to Pacquiao's upper - body offense is his frenetic footwork.
sentences.cn: 他那惊人的步法,有助于加强防御,同时增加攻击的角度.

sentences.en: And how many charges will Fisher draw against the overly - frenetic Brooks?
sentences.cn: 费舍尔面对狂热的布鲁克将有多少进攻机会 呢 ?

sentences.en: By contrast Mr McCain's initial reactions were frenetic and contradictory.
sentences.cn: 相比之下,麦凯恩最初的反应是乱了阵脚,相互矛盾.

sentences.en: Even so, they continued to invest in Latin America, albeit at a frenetic pace.
sentences.cn: 即使这样, 他们还是一如既往的在拉丁美洲投资(尽管放慢了脚步).
事故之后传来一片狂叫声.

sentences.en: It generated much excitement and frenetic activity.
sentences.cn: 这使人们非常激动并导致了狂热的行动.

sentences.en: Jazz brings together frenetic syncopation with beautiful melodies to create one very cool package.
sentences.cn: 爵士乐把狂热的切分音和美妙的旋律结合起来形成很酷的有机整体.

sentences.en: She rushes from job to job at a frenetic pace.
sentences.cn: 她发疯似的不停地跳槽。

sentences.en: The conclusion of the book somewhat frenetic.
Thus frenetic diplomacy in New York and in the Middle East is likely to continue.
sentences.cn: 因此疯狂外交在纽约和在中东地区很可能会继续下去.

trans.tran_cn: 发狂的，狂乱的，狂热的，非常激动的
trans.tran_en: frenetic activity is fast and not very organized
